welcome_message_body: Welcome to Clarksville, where the charm of our historic downtown and the natural beauty of the Cumberland River await you. Take some time to explore and enjoy our vibrant city!

restaurants.name: Bojangles
restaurants.description: Bojangles is a fast food restaurant located in Clarksville.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights and houses the airport's main amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Campbell AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Campbell AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
